definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: The Toco Toucan lives in central and eastern South America.
sentences.chinese: 託科巨嘴鳥生活在南美中部和西部地區。

sentences.english: Toucans also have a narrow, feather-like tongue.
sentences.chinese: 巨嘴鳥也有狹窄部份，像羽毛一樣的舌。

sentences.english: In actuality, Kayiwa developed this design based on the bill of a Toucan bird.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，卡伊娃是根據巨嘴鳥的嘴發明的這個設計。

sentences.english: There are about 40 different kinds of toucans .
sentences.chinese: 有大約40個不同類型的巨嘴鳥。

sentences.english: A toucan is a South American bird.
sentences.chinese: 巨嘴鳥是北美的一種鳥。

sentences.english: Toucans are found in South and Central America in the canopy layer of the rainforest.
sentences.chinese: 巨嘴鳥在雨林的天篷層的南方和中美洲被發現。

sentences.english: Toucans make their homes in holes in trees.
sentences.chinese: 巨嘴鳥挖樹的洞他們的家。

sentences.english: How many toucans can you see in the picture?
sentences.chinese: 在圖片裏你看見了多少巨嘴鳥？

sentences.english: Or, at least, a visual warning to other toucans.
sentences.chinese: 或者，至少它是向其它巨嘴鳥發出的一個視覺警告。
